seed_pair.known: He wants to come back with everyone else later on.
seed_pair.target: Él quiere volver con todos los demás más tarde.

curation_metadata.curated_by: Claude Code - Phase 5 v3.0 STRICT GATE compliance
curation_metadata.gate_compliance_note: Regenerated with strict GATE compliance - only exact Spanish forms taught in LEGOs through S0015

practice_phrases: I want to speak with him tomorrow
I'm going to try with him
I'm not sure if I can speak with him
no estoy seguro si puedo hablar con él
I speak Spanish with him now
I want to learn Spanish with him tomorrow
quiero aprender español con él mañana
I'm trying to speak with him today
estoy intentando hablar con él hoy
I'd like to be able to speak with him
me gustaría poder hablar con él
I'm going to practise speaking Spanish with him as often as possible
voy a practicar hablar español con él lo más frecuentemente posible
S0016L01.full_seed_included: NO - missing 'wants', 'to come back', 'with everyone else', 'later on'
S0016L01.gate_compliance: STRICT - Only exact forms from S0001-S0015 LEGOs. Note: 'él' used as object pronoun 'him' in prepositional phrases (con él)
